EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-05-09-RD-Sponsored-San Diego.Marketing Invite 1 - Resend.EMAIL 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Baseball is Back – Turbonomic IT Networking Event 5/9 – Padres vs. Nationals
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-san-diego-padres-vs-washington-nationals-registration-44703604685]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Turbonomic is getting ready to host an IT Networking Event <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-san-diego-padres-vs-washington-nationals-registration-44703604685]]> with our friends at Cisco in San Diego for a cocktail hour on workload automation in the auditorium at Petco Park. After, we will proceed to the Turbonomic suite for an evening of baseball as your San Diego Padres take on Bryce Harper and the Washington Nationals.
IT Networking Event San Diego San Diego Padres vs Washington Nationals Wednesday, May 9th | Petco Park | 5:00p
Join your peers as we share knowledge and discuss how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of the hybrid cloud.
Save the date for 5/9 at 5:00 pm by registering here <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-san-diego-padres-vs-washington-nationals-registration-44703604685]]>.
I hope you'll be able to join us,
Murphy Vandervelde
Murphy Vandervelde Sr. Field Marketing Program Manager, Turbonomic M. 339.225.2502
